CustomField.description: Used to display what business units this contact has a role with case #29082942 added Payroll Contact Role to formula
CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK(HRO_Contact_Role__c)),'HRO,',null) &' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(MMS__c)),'MMS,',null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Premier_Contact_Role__c)),'Premier,',null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(S125_Contact_Role__c)),'S125,',null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(TAA_Contact_Role__c)),'TAA,',null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(X401k_Contact_Role__c)),'401k,',null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Safety_Contact_Role__c)),'Safety,',null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(GL_Contact_Role__c)),'GL,',null)& IF (NOT(ISBLANK( MSP_Contact_Role__c )),'MSP,',null)& IF (NOT(ISBLANK( PAO_Contact_Role__c )),'PAO,',null)&' ' & IF(ISPICKVAL( EW_Contact_Role__c, "EW Administrator") || ISPICKVAL(EW_Contact_Role__c, "Decision Maker") , 'EW,', null)&' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(HRE_Handbook_Contact_Role__c)),'HRE Handbook,',null) &' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(ESR_Contact_Role__c)),'ESR,',null) &' ' & IF (NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Payroll_Contact_Role__c))),'Payroll',null)&' ' & IF(ISPICKVAL( HROi_Handbook_contact_role__c,"HROi"),"HROi" ,null)
CustomField.label: BU Contact
